name: Atomes DE SCALE
description: Atomes De Scale is a powerful cleaning and descaler based on hydrochloric acid. DE SCALE also contains a CORROSION inhibitor to protect carbon steel, copper, and brass from acid attack. This inhibitor also acts as a penetrant and dispersant, enhancing the acid's effectiveness.Â DE SCALE is a product that can be used to dissolve lime scale (calcium carbonate) deposits in boilers, calorifiers, and heat exchangers.
